name: StoryCraft - collaborative story writing with choose your next action rpg play
name_original: StoryCraft - collaborative story writing with choose your next action rpg play
description:
StoryCraft mixes collaborative story writing with Choose-Your-Next-Action rpg play.

It allows users to choose their own path through an endless world created by other users.

And it lets users add their own content to the StoryCraft world at any location.

+ Collaboration - add your own scenes and actions at any point in the StoryCraft world.
+ Explore the world of StoryCraft using Choose-Your-Next-Action navigation.
+ Choose your collaborators or open up collaboration to all.
+ Construct scenes using text and images.
+ Follow your favorite writers and friends.
+ Use social features such as news feeds, comments, likes, and followers.
+ Use your imagination and have fun!
